Description: Fragment of a weft-faced extended plain weave, woollen tunic; Pale yellowish brown; Warp: Z spin, c.25 tpc; Weft: Z spun, c.48 paired threads per cm; Edges: ragged
Curator's comments: Previous location Cupboard 64, brown box; Z spin points to a relatively late date if Egyptian, combination of Z spin and paired weft might indicazte a much earlier origin outside egypt eg: Roman Italy, however, quality and state of preservation make the later date more likely; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (19/9/1a989)
Condition: Good, holes; Unknown date stuck to sticky net
